text: Giancarlo Ghironzi (25 February 1932https://www.google.com/search?client=ms- android- samsung&biw;=412&bih;=652&tbm;=bks&sxsrf;=ALeKk03gi-50HCGujRWbFPmJ__6xmerpHw%3A1585599002537&ei;=GlKCXp- lINWEhbIP6uS7iA4&q;=giancarlo+ghironzi+25+febbraio+1932&oq;=giancarlo+ghironzi+25+febbraio+1932&gs;_l=mobile- gws- serp.12...8555.9119.0.10026.3.3.0.0.0.0.420.420.4-1.1.0....0...1c.1j4.64.mobile- gws-serp..2.0.0....0.gdBZ7d1LI9A â€“ 14 March 2020) was a Sammarinese politician. He was twice Captain Regent of San Marino from 1 April 1961 to 1 October 1961, and from 1 October 1969 to 1 April 1970. He was a member of the Sammarinese Christian Democratic Party (PDCS). Ghironzi died on 14 March 2020 at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Captains Regent of San Marino
title: Giancarlo Ghironzi
